properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. TUG NAS PATHFINDER, WHITE AND BLACK HULL,
   SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN 46-01.8N 007-40.8W AT 081950Z FEB. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ETEL,
   TELEX: 42950519, PHONE: 332 9755 3535,
   FAX: 332 9755 4934, E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 448/18.
